enhanced_by.reason: The push method adds an item to the stack, which is necessary to test the peek method effectively.
The empty method checks if the stack is empty, which is useful to test the peek method's behavior when the stack is empty.
The pop method removes the top item from the stack, which can be used to test the peek method's behavior after an item is removed.
The peek(int) method retrieves an item from a specific depth in the stack, which can be used to test the peek method's behavior in conjunction with depth-based retrieval.
